root: ^"Ay, you're back. You got what I've asked for?"

Givethings: ^"Hah, I knew I could count on you. Here, just as I promised, you can have one of my swords."
^"Listen, kiddo, do you mind doing another thing for me?"
Quest: ^"I have an agreement with the lumberjack. He was supposed to bring me fresh wood, but he hasn't been seen in the village for a few days. I want you to check his hut in the forest and see if he's still alive."
